name: YOU ARE GUN
description:
Shoot to kill, but also shoot to move. Zip around the arena using your recoil in this top-down shooter.

Left-click: Shoot

Right-click: Reload

Use the cursor to aim.

This was a project for my game design course in university. I'm planning to add procedural level generation, interactables like explosive barrels, pickups like health and power-ups, and more weapons to the game. This will be done in my free-time, as I do not do game design fulltime.

Music: Gargoyle's Numb End - Arp 220

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Gargoyles_Numb_End/Arp_220__Arp_299/Arp_220
